import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Grid, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' const _MovieGenresList = () => { const [movieList, setMovieList] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchMovies = async e => { try{ const list = await fetch('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie?api_key=224ce27b38a3805ecf6f6c36eb3ba9d0&with_genres=28') const listOfImages = list.map(x => x) setMovieList(listOfImages); // console.log(movieList); } catch(err) { console.log(err) } } fetchMovies(); }, []); return(
) } export default _MovieGenresList
